name: reversegeocoding
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool forward_reverse_geocoding.
Tool description: Forward & Reverse Geocoding API. Get address by location or location by address.
API description: Perform reverse geocoding to find an address or place by latitude and longitude.

json_callback.description: JSON callback function name for cross-domain requests.

polygon_geojson.description: Include a GeoJSON polygon for the results.

limit.description: Limit the number of returned results.

accept_language.description: Set the response language. Accepts two letter language codes (e.g. 'en' or 'es') or a combination of language and region code, e.g. 'en-GB' or 'es-AR'. Default: 'en'.

polygon_kml.description: Include KML polygon in the results.

zoom.description: Level of detail required for the address details.

polygon_svg.description: Include SVG polygon in the results.

addressdetails.description: Include full address breakdown in the results.

namedetails.description: Include a list of alternative names in the results.

polygon_threshold.description: Simplify the returned polygons to a threshold level.

polygon_text.description: Include a WKT polygon in the results.
